word: G2603 - καταβραβεύω - katabrabeúō - kat-ab-rab-yoo'-o - Beguile of reward

sections.paragraph: to decide as umpire against one, to declare him unworthy of the prize; to defraud of the prize of victory
ஆங்கில மூலம் / Original in English: From G2596 and G1018 (in its original sense); to award the price against, that is, (figuratively) to defraud (of salvation): - beguile of reward.
